summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of West 71st Street, from 28th Avenue Northwest to 32nd Avenue Northwest; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7482, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
